text: Sphingomonas laterariae is a Gram-negative, rod-shaped and non-motile bacteria from the genus of Sphingomonas which has been isolated from a dump site which was contaminated with hexachlorocyclohexane in Ummari in India.Deutsche Sammlung von Mikroorganismen und Zellkulturen UniProt == Further reading == * == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Sphingomonas laterariae at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase laterariae Category:Bacteria described in 2012
title: Sphingomonas laterariae
